pkgmetadata.longdescription: Obtain Suggested Coordinate Reference System Information for Spatial Data // Uses data from the 'EPSG' Registry to look up suitable coordinate reference system transformations for spatial datasets in R. Returns a data frame with 'CRS' codes that can be used for 'CRS' transformation and mapping projects. Please see the 'EPSG' Dataset Terms of Use at https://epsg.org/terms-of-use.html for more information.
